title: Snow Globe
summaries: The Snow Globe is a Hardmode item used to summon the Frost Legion event. It can be obtained from Presents (dropped during the Christmas event), which must be opened specifically in Hardmode worlds, with a 6.67*1/15 (6.67%) chance. It can then be used in any world at any time.

statistics.Max stack: 9999 (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 1 (Old-gen console and 3DS versions)
